election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1789 Constitutional Convention, Mifflin County

overview.note: The election results from Greenwood and Lack townships were disputed but are included in these totals. Without the votes from these two townships, the final totals would be 516 for Thomas Beale and 610 for William Brown.

"There was also received this day returns of elections held at the house of widow Stackhole, for the township of Lack, and of an election for Greenwood township, in this county, held at the house of Henry McConnell, for Greenwood township, in this county, the legality of electing at these places being disputed by part of the judges, the law authorising said elections not being present, we have thought proper to forward to your honorable body a statement of the election, both with and without the returns from these townships of Greenwood and Lack." Minutes of the Convention. Albert Gallatin Papers. Reel 2.

election_record.reference: Minutes of the Convention. Albert Gallatin Papers. Reel 2.
